title: website: release history links to missing "Go1.5.3" milestone
body:
The [release history](https://golang.org/doc/devel/release.html#go1.5.minor) page links to the [Go1.5.3](https://github.com/golang/go/issues?q=milestone%3AGo1.5.3) milestone on GitHub, which does not currently exist. I'd expect the milestone to be available for viewing, or to not be linked from the release notes.

Of the 23 released versions of Go (go1, go1.0.1, ..., go1.6), 21 have matching milestones on GitHub. The Go1.2.2 and Go1.5.3 milestones are missing, though I don't know of any links to the former.

Has the milestone been intentionally removed?
